attributes.action: Make people earn their jobseekers allowance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are many problems facing British society that could be eliminated by making people that are claiming jobseekers allowance allocate a portion of their time to doing jobs to earn their Dole. We are plagued by litter, graffitti etc. I for one would rather earn my money no matter where it came from.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
